#install and usage tutorial for JacpFX.

*currently for JacpFX beta 1.1*

= Prerequirements =
  * OS: windows >= xp, OSX (lion), any Linux
  * Java 7 update 6 (only dev. preview available)... download here: http://jdk7.java.net/download.html
  * set JAVA_HOME
  * maven installed

if you want to create native executables yo need:

  * on windows: http://www.jrsoftware.org/isdl.php to generate exe; http://wix.sourceforge.net/ to generate msi
  * on osx (xcode? it is always installed? at least for me ;-) )
  * on linux "rpmbuild"

= Create a project from archetype =
{{{ mvn archetype:generate   \ }}}
{{{ -DarchetypeGroupId=org.jacp \ }}}
{{{ -DarchetypeArtifactId=JacpFX-quickstart-archetype  \ }}}
{{{ -DarchetypeVersion=1.1  \ }}}
{{{ -DarchetypeRepository=\ }}}
{{{ http://developer.ahcp.de/nexus/content/repositories/jacp }}}

= JacpFX development=
  * the archetype genaretes an example project including a JavaFX perspective, a FXML perspective, two JavaFX components, two FXML components, astateful- and a stateless-component
